data.text: Waaqayyo isa ni eega; bara jireenya isaas ni dheeressa;
Waaqayyo siree inni dhukkubsatee irra ciisu irratti isa kunuunsa;
Diinonni koo hamminaan, “Inni yoom duʼee maqaan isaa
Namni tokko yeroo na gaafachuu dhufutti,
Warri na jibban hundinuu waaʼee koo walitti hasaasu;
Ati garuu yaa Waaqayyo na baasi;
Akka ati natti gammaddu ani beeka;
Ati sababii amanamummaa kootiitiif utubdee na qabda;
